code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CSVViewer(){const[files,setFiles]=useState([]);const[selectedFile,setSelectedFile]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{axios.get('/api/files').then(response=>{setFiles(response.data);}).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching files:',error));},[]);const handleFileChange=event=>{setSelectedFile(event.target.value);};const handleDownload=()=>{if(selectedFile){window.location.href="/download/".concat(selectedFile);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"CSV File Downloader"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:selectedFile,onChange:handleFileChange,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Select a file"}),files.map((file,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:file,children:file},index))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDownload,disabled:!selectedFile,children:"Download"})]});}export default CSVViewer;
